The Sound of BRM V16 F1 car. This was and still is a truly amazing car and motor. Built in the late 1940's and early 1950's, the motor was an approximately 1.5 liter(1487.76 CC) V16 fed by a supercharger peaking at 5.7 bar(82.7 PSI) of boost and revving to an astounding 12,000 RPMs and producing approximately 600 peak HP
http://s536.photobucket.com/albums/f...ent=067mpg.flv
